attributes.action: Help me to become a British citizen
attributes.additional_details: I lived in England for 30 half years went to school and college started to work at 16 and had many more till I was 29 then I got laid off because I was born In Belize and I have no British passport.  So my dad save up to £1000 so I can become a British citizen and guess what the HOME OFFICE has refused me becoming one I am so upset  have not worked for 2 years  and All I want to do is to work to provide for children and one day get married to the mother of my kids please sign this petition to help me THANK YOU

rejection.details: E-petitions cannot be used to raise personal issues.
